column4: hey i want to ask a question....do u know why APTonCD on my ubuntu 9.10 can't backup all of the packages?? and do you have a solutin for it?
i am not bot anyway
hey i want to ask a question....do u know why APTonCD on my ubuntu 9.10 can't backup all of the packages?? and do you have a solutin for it?.....no one answers my question..
why do you want to backup old packages???
burn them to a cd???
go ahead what is your point?? they'll be outdated in about 3 months.. what exactly are you saving the .deb packages for??
that is why we use apt-get install program  and program and program
you want to know location of the .deb files to burn to disk??? yes no
there compressed files in the first place how many are you trying to backup ???
this is a dvd you should be able to write 4 gigs of data to this disc... you selecting the write way to burn the data...???
what is it giving that you don't have permissions to folder or what?? what is the error msg???
burn it 2 dvd
burn it 2 dvds ... problem solved
select half the list files and burn to disk... hyperstation are you trying to do this from the command line or in a gui???
are you playing with the program or the folder location of all the files
are you in folder with all the tar.gz files are located
no no no places > my computer > file system > open folders /var /lib /apt /cache select form the list half the files and right click burn to disc should work...

that is why danbhfive gave you the location to the files so you could select the folder and burn the selected amount should have wrote down the path to the cache and gone to the folder selected half the packages and drag and droped the packages to the program aptoncd
what are you taking about did you finalize the burn on aptoncd or burn to disc... your confusing me...??? did you burn list to disc
or is it not letting you burn to disc because you have selected to many files delete half the list and burn to disc.. this is not rocket science you need to learn how to use the program
great sounds good stop complaining about having to do maintence tasks... every person has same takes ... even me..
